name: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii Audio

screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .er file in VideoLAN VLC media player
screenshot.caption: ER file open in VideoLAN VLC media player

description: Gamers who have homebrew-enabled their Wii or use the Dolphin emulator can download and play Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii. When downloaded, the game arrives as a .ZIP archive. Decompressing this archive allows you to view the game's constituent files.

The game's Music subdirectory contains a series of ER files. These files are used to play in-game music and sound effects. Many of the ER files that contain music are named for the level in which they are used.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .er file in VideoLAN VLC media player
images.caption: ER file open in VideoLAN VLC media player
